text: The Pac-12 Conference is a group of universities who play each other in football, basketball, and other sports. It has won more national championships than any other conference. In 2024, the conference will have just 2 members This is a list of colleges and universities who play sports in the Pac-12 Conference: *University of Arizona leaving *Arizona State University leaving *University of California, Berkeley ("California") leaving *University of Colorado at Boulder ("Colorado") leaving *University of Oregon leaving *Oregon State University *Stanford University leaving *University of California, Los Angeles ("UCLA") leaving *University of Southern California ("USC") leaving *University of Utah leaving *University of Washington leaving *Washington State University ==References== *
title: Pac-12 Conference
